citations.narrative:
In an outdoor pen housing 3 emus, 7 zebu, 16 goats, 12 geese, and 3 turkeys, there is standing water along the interior
perimeter and mud throughout. There is one open shelter made up of a roof and 6 wooden posts that has a small area of
dry ground beneath it. The dry area is not large enough for all the animals to stand on it at the same time leaving animals
standing in the mud. The animals must also walk through the mud to access food and water. The feet of several animals
were noted sinking into the muddy ground. Mud and standing water can lead to discomfort due to soiling of the animals
and can contribute to skin and foot issues. Primary enclosures for animals must have a suitable method to eliminate
excess water.
To be corrected by October 27, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.127(c) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
In an outdoor pen housing 3 emus, 7 zebu, 16 goats, 12 geese, and 3 turkeys, there is standing water along the interior 
perimeter and mud throughout. There is one open shelter made up of a roof and 6 wooden posts that has a small area of 
dry ground beneath it. The dry area is not large enough for all the animals to stand on it at the same time leaving animals 
standing in the mud. The animals must also walk through the mud to access food and water. The feet of several animals 
were noted sinking into the muddy ground. Mud and standing water can lead to discomfort due to soiling of the animals 
and can contribute to skin and foot issues. Primary enclosures for animals must have a suitable method to eliminate 
excess water. 
To be corrected by October 27, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: CONGO AFRICAN GREY PARROT / GRAY PARROT
